article.headline: Poteat, Rechsteiner lead five in double figures to send Va. Tech past USC Upstate
article.description: — Mylyjael Poteat and Brandon Rechsteiner scored 19 points apiece and Virginia Tech beat South Carolina Upstate 93-74 on Friday night.
article.linkText: Poteat, Rechsteiner lead five in double figures to send Va. Tech past USC Upstate

images.caption: Carmelo Adkins knocks down the triple

video.headline: Mylyjael Poteat gets the hoop and the harm
video.caption: Mylyjael Poteat gets the hoop and the harm
video.title: Mylyjael Poteat gets the hoop and the harm
video.description: Mylyjael Poteat gets the hoop and the harm

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Mylyjael Poteat gets the hoop and the harm) 2024/11/09 ESHEET

article.story: BLACKSBURG, Va. -- — Mylyjael Poteat and Brandon Rechsteiner scored 19 points apiece and Virginia Tech beat South Carolina Upstate 93-74 on Friday night. Freshman reserve Tyler Johnson scored 16 points, Jaydon Young 14, and Toibu Lawal and Jaden Schutt 10 apiece for the Hokies (2-0). Carmelo Adkins scored 20 points, freshman Mister Dean 18 and Karmani Gregory 15 for the Spartans (1-1). Virginia Tech led 37-32 at halftime and used an 11-5 start in the first 3:55 of the second half for a 48-37 lead. With 12:58 left, USC Upstate's Daniel Helterhoff made a 3-pointer to reduce the Spartans' deficit to 56-50. But Young responded with a 3, Rechsteiner made a layup and Poteat made two free throws for a 63-59 lead. The Hokies stayed ahead by double digits the rest of the way. The Spartans opened the game outscoring Virginia Tech 16-2 over the first 6 1/2 minutes before Virginia Tech launched its comeback and led by five at halftime. Helterhoff's jumper with 2:06 before halftime marked the Spartans' last lead at 30-28. Virginia Tech is 3-1 all-time against USC Upstate. ------ Get poll alerts and updates on the AP Top 25 throughout the season. Sign up here. AP collegebasketball: https://apnews.com/hub/ap-top-25-college-basketball-poll and https://apnews.com/hub/college-basketball
